hackathon-description-text: Hack@WPI is WPI’s third annual hackathon. On January 13-15, students at WPI gather to create, learn, and build software and hardware projects over a 2 day period.
hackathon-rules:
- YOU MUST BE AT HACK@WPI TO WORK ON A PROJECT FOR SUBMISSION
- We strongly discourage building off of existing projects you've worked on. To be fair to others, let us know if you are using some of your old code in your hacks. Using third-party APIs and libraries is definitely okay, as long as they're accessible by everyone else as well.
- You cannot steal another team's source code
- The decision of judges is final for determining prizes and awards
- Please comply with all instructions from Hack@WPI organizers

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Amazon Web Services
Best Domain Name Registered with Domain.com
Best Project in the Public Interest

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Campus Center, West St, Worcester, MA 01609, USA

hackathon-description-header: Build software and hardware projects at our school-wide hackathon.
